column1: 1 ^ The fool hath said in his heart
column2: "There is no God". They are corrupt
column3: and are become abominable in their pursuits~; there is none that doth good

column1: 2 ^ The Lord hath looked down from heaven upon the children of men
column2: to see if there be any that understand and seek God.
they are become unprofitable together. There is none that doth good

column1: 4 ^ Shall not all they know that work iniquity
column2: who devour my people as the food of bread~?

column1: 5 ^ They have not called upon the Lord~; there have they trembled for fear
6 ^ For the Lord is in the just generation~; you have confounded the counsel of the poor man
column2: but the Lord is his hope.

column1: 7 ^ Who shall give out of Sion the salvation of Israel~? When the Lord shall have turned away the captivity of his people
